page.title: 11Manor Farm.
page.content: {The Lister Family of Manor Farm. } Mr. Lister has an{arable farm}on the edge of the Bessacarr Housing Estate. The Doncaster-Lincoln Railway and the A1 south run close by.The soil is light and sandy.The main crops are winter and spring barley, peas, potatoes and oil seed rape.There are 25 machines on the farm including 3 tractors, 5 trailors, combine harvester, drills, hay and potato equipment. There are{38}fields of varying sizes. The farmer and his wife have been married for 19 years and have 4 children the eldest is 17 the youngest is 8.They have got two dogs, a pony and some chickens.The family have a holiday in the country every summer and they enjoy agricultural shows like the Great Yorkshire Show.
